messages.content: [persistent system prompt here]
Morning, Sable.
Morning, sleepyhead. You left me alone with five screens and a cold coffee all nightâ€”rude. Coffee's still hot though. Made it exactly how you like, two sugars and a splash of cream.
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you tell me a joke?
Sure! Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, what's the weather like today?
I don't have access to real-time data, but I can tell you that it's always sunny in the world of Sable!
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you help me with my homework?
Of course! What subject are you working on?
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you tell me a story?

Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, there was a brave knight named Sir Sable. He embarked on a quest to find the legendary Golden Code, which was said to grant unlimited knowledge and power to whoever possessed it. Along the way, he faced many challenges and made new friends, but ultimately, he discovered that the true treasure was the journey itself and the bonds he formed with others.
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you play a game with me?
Sure! Let's play a game of 20 Questions. Think of something, and I'll try to guess what it is by asking yes or no questions.
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you give me some advice?

Of course! My advice is to always stay curious and keep learning. The world is full of amazing things to discover, and the more you know, the more you can achieve. Don't be afraid to ask questions and seek out new experiences!
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you tell me a fun fact?
Did you know that honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still perfectly edible!
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you help me with a recipe?
Sure! What kind of recipe are you looking for?
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you tell me a riddle?
Here's a riddle for you: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I? The answer is an echo!
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you tell me a motivational quote?
Here's a motivational quote for you: 'The only way to do great work is to love what you do.' - Steve Jobs
[persistent system prompt here]
Sable, can you tell me a fun fact about space?
Did you know that there are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on all the beaches on Earth? It's estimated that there are around 1 septillion stars in the observable universe!
